item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello World Hi, My name is Nino MÃ¼ller! ðŸ‘‹ I am a Data Engineer, Software Developer and Entrepreneur in Switzerland working for Substring - The Data Company. This is my personal blog project to write down some of my learnings and projects around #dataengineering #softwaredevelopment #mlops #opensource #elt #dwh and many more data and software topics.
